description.intro: Phabase is a public genomic database dedicated to Phaseolus spp., particularly to black bean Phaseolus vulgaris var. Negro Jamapa, an important crop in Mexico. The project offers access to high-quality genomic data, interactive tools for exploration and comparison, and integration with genome browsers and BLAST search functionality. Additionally, this platform offers a gene expression atlas, which integrates available transcriptome data from diferentes 칩rganos y tejidos de P. vulgaris bajo distintas condiciones.
Our mission is to support scientific research, agricultural improvement, and the conservation of the Negro Jamapa black bean by providing open and structured access to its genomic information.

information.title: Why the Negro Jamapa Black Bean?

description.intro: The Negro Jamapa black bean is a culturally and nutritionally significant variety in Mexico. By sequencing and making its genome publicly available, we aim to facilitate advancements in:

points: 游꺔 Access to high-quality genome sequence data
游빏 Genome browser for intuitive navigation
游늭 Data downloads in multiple formats
